title: Booker T Washington National Monument: Accessibility
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Accessibility             Accessibility        GENERAL INFORMATION     If your questions concerning accessibility are unanswered after reading the below information, please contact us at (540) 721-2094 [TDD users can use the same number] or email us.   Also, learn about the The America the Beautiful National Parks and Federal Recreational Lands Access Pass-- or simply, the Access Pass -- which provides a wide range of discounts on activities and services when you visit federal lands.   Access Pass page of NPS.gov   http://www.nps.gov/findapark/passes.htm   ► Booker T. Washington National Monument is a free park; therefore, we do not  carry the America the Beautiful National Parks and Federal Recreational Lands    Access Pass   ● No pay phone   ● Water: A water fountain is located outside the rear doors of the visitor center and is wheelchair accessible    Physcial/Mobility Accessibility   Deaf/Hearing Loss Accessibility       Blind/Low Vision Accessibility     Cognitive/Learning Accessibility   Service Animals            Contact Information: Dial 9-1-1 For Emergencies   Booker T. Washington National Monument is continually working to improve access for all visitors. If you have any comments or suggestions concerning access during your visit to Booker T. Washington NM or desire more information about the park, please contact:   Booker T. Washington NM 12130 Booker T. Washington Hwy Hardy, VA 24101 (540) 721-2094 E-mail us
